MovieScript: Maverick is called back to Top Gun to train elite pilots for a dangerous mission. Among them is Rooster, the son of his late friend, whose strained past with Maverick creates tension. Cyclone doubts Maverick’s unconventional methods, while Iceman, now an admiral, supports him. With help from Hondo, Maverick pushes the recruits to their limits while rekindling his relationship with Penny. As the mission unfolds, Maverick and Rooster must overcome their differences, executing a daring escape that cements their trust and Maverick’s enduring legacy.
